org.apache.giraph.worker

类 DefaultWorkerObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.worker.DefaultWorkerObserver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable, WorkerObserver

    public class DefaultWorkerObserver
extends Object
implements WorkerObserver, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
    Default Observer for Worker that does nothing.

    • 方法详细资料

      • preApplication

        public void preApplication()
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerObserver
        Initialize the WorkerContext. This method is executed once on each Worker before the first superstep starts.
        指定者:
        preApplication 在接口中 WorkerObserver

      • postApplication

        public void postApplication()
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerObserver
        Finalize the WorkerContext. This method is executed once on each Worker after the last superstep ends.
        指定者:
        postApplication 在接口中 WorkerObserver

      • preSuperstep

        public void preSuperstep(long superstep)
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerObserver
        Execute user code. This method is executed once on each Worker before each superstep starts.
        指定者:
        preSuperstep 在接口中 WorkerObserver
        参数:
        superstep - number of superstep

      • postSuperstep

        public void postSuperstep(long superstep)
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerObserver
        Execute user code. This method is executed once on each Worker after each superstep ends.
        指定者:
        postSuperstep 在接口中 WorkerObserver
        参数:
        superstep - number of superstep
